introduction: The drama unfolds with Ayesha and Raza’s lives intersecting under unexpected circumstances. Despite coming from different social backgrounds, their connection grows, challenging societal norms and family expectations. The narrative delves into the sacrifices both must make and the obstacles they must overcome to be together.As their love story develops, Ayesha and Raza face opposition from their families and external pressures. The drama explores themes of trust, betrayal, and the enduring strength of love. The characters must navigate their pasts and confront societal expectations, testing the limits of their commitment to each other
